Text:
Happy New Year!!! :)

i have one last request from you for the year, could you please upload Notting Hill in about 550 Mb in any format you like!

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0125439/
I havent been dling of late... just want to wish you a Happy New year! May you have all you wish for and happiness. Thank you for all the effort and quality Encodes. Mwah!
@all: I see few sitting ducks on 0%. Follow instructions I gave few times or disable PB altogether.

@redriding: I wish you too, my friend.

@r-0987: I already planned that, like month ago, but it must wait till end of January. Happy New 2011!
@r-0987: I forgot to mention - if you can, download 1 GB 720p version I upped right now, because small version could be postponed or dropped out.

Happy New Year, and thanks for all your time spent. 
Keep well my friend
@nitrogun: Thank you. Happy New Year and to your loved ones too.

2040 - you are the absolute greatest! Thank you so very, very much - I can't tell you how grateful I am!

And I hope you have a spectacular 2011 - you deserve it, that's for sure.

With great appreciation,
LittleFang

Sorry if my comments appear twice 2040.. I just left one before but I can't see it.

I just wanted to say thank you, thank you, thank you for uploading this - it's so generous of you and I can't tell you how grateful and appreciative I am.

I'm very excited about seeing this movie - I've wanted to see it for ages and it got great reviews.

So thank you. And I hope you have a spectacularly good 2011 - you deserve it!

With much gratitude and appreciation,
LittleFang

And of course *now* my first comment appears. Oh well - you deserved double the amount of thank you's!

Will stop bombarding you with comments now..!
@LittleFang: Enjoy the movie and new years ahead.

Definitely great! Thank you.

Best regards,

K.
